extendedInfo.description: Thermal Diffusivity Calculator is a quick tool to calculate the Thermal Diffusivity of a material which describes the rate at which heat flows through a material.  		The Thermal Diffusivity of a material is calculated from the thermal conductivity, density, and specific heat capacity of the material. Easy to understand the inputs.â¢	All the calculations are done at an eye blink time. Very Speedy Calculator.â¢	All the calculations are very simultaneous. If any of the parameter used in the calculation changes, the new result is calculated on the spot.â¢	A Help Menu. Each difficult concepts are well explained in an easy and diagrammatically way.
